'''Epitome Invocation''' is the only [[Weapon Event Wish]]. It provides a rate-up for different weapons in the item pool. 5-star characters cannot be obtained from Epitome Invocation, but 4-star characters may be acquired.

See [[Wishes]] for more information on rates.

==Wish History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
*Community data (before Epitomized Path) from Wish Counter sites like Paimon.moe and genshin-wishes shows an equal chance of obtaining both of the 5* rate-up weapons and all of the 4* rate-ups. For example:
**In the Aquila Favonia and Song of Broken Pines banner, out of all 5* weapon pulls submitted to paimon.moe, 14678 (41.4%) are Aquila Favonia while 14327 (40.4%) are Song of Broken Pines. <ref>Paimon.moe: [https://paimon.moe/wish/tally?id=400012 Aquila Favonia/Song of Broken Pines Banner Wish Tally]</ref>
**In the Freedom Sworn and Skyward Atlas banner, out of all 5* weapon pulls submitted to genshin-wishes, 3844 (43.1%) are Skyward Atlas and 3542 (39.7%) are Freedom Sworn. <ref>Genshin Wishes: [https://genshin-wishes.com/global-stats/weapon-event?event=31 Freedom-Sworn/Skyward Atlas Banner Wish Tally]</ref>
